Uses of ContextFactory in php.java.bridge.http
 

Methods in php.java.bridge.http that return ContextFactory
static ContextFactory ContextFactory.addNew()
          Create a new ContextFactory and add it to the list of context factories kept by this VM.
static ContextFactory ContextFactory.get(java.lang.String id)
          Returns the context factory associated with the given id
